<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Basic Druid Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=702) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 225 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Druid](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=6)

**Prerequisites**
[Druid Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=701)

</column>

---

You gain the [basic spellcasting benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=170).

<title level="2">Basic Druid Spellcasting leads to...</title>
[Expert Druid Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=707), [Primal Breadth](/Feats.aspx?ID=706)
name: Basic Druid Spellcasting
